Posts.EditableText: This is the game we made in less than an hour. It probably has some scripts we forgot to put but it's still ok. It has 4 rooms already. It is an easy game,I think. This is our 3rd game. It has no puzzles in it yet. Posts.HTML:
This is the game we made in less than an hour. It probably has some scripts we forgot to put but it's still ok. It has 4 rooms already. It is an easy game,I think. This is our 3rd game. It has no puzzles in it yet.
http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/rria7xdbl0_ccomwyv0dgw/dungeon
You can play it just click the link
The name isn't that original. We couldn't think of anything else.
